text.__SUMMARY__: Crinum lorifolium is a species of flowering plants in the family Amaryllidaceae. It is found in India and Myanmar.
text.References: Roxburgh, W. ex Ker Gawl., 1817 In: J. Sci. Arts (London) 3: 110
